Module ATU
Package ATU.utils

Class ATUEngine

java.lang.Object
ATU.utils.ATUEngine
public class ATUEngine extends Object
The class for the ATUEngine The ATUEngine is responsible for grouping the students into groups with the best possible distribution

    • createGroups

      public Person[][] createGroups()
      function to create the optimal groups for the students
      Returns:
      the 2-D array of the groups where first each row is a group and the row's index is the group id
